title: One-pot chemo- and photo-enzymatic linear cascade processes
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,7875-7938
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00595J, Review Article

J. M. Carceller, K. S. Arias, M. J. Climent, S. Iborra, A. Corma
This review explores linear cascade reactions by combining chemo-, photo- and biocatalysts for organic synthesis and strategies to overcome incompatibility issues.
